cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch

Class InterfaceAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch.InterfaceAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The object type (this is an interface)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>

    public class InterfaceAdapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>
    This is an adapter to allow Gson to properly serialize and deserialize interface objects so that they may retain knowledge of their type.
    Author:
    Maciek Makowski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InterfaceAdapter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T deserialize(com.google.gson.JsonElement elem, java.lang.reflect.Type interfaceType, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializationContext context)
      This allows for the deserialization of objects that use an interface in order to retain information of the implementing object.
      com.google.gson.JsonElement serialize(T object, java.lang.reflect.Type interfaceType, com.google.gson.JsonSerializationContext context)
      This allows for the serialization of objects that use an interface to be wrapped and retain memory of its type.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
